hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select tree.unit from CommonUnitTree tree where 1 = 1 and ( lower(tree.unit.name) like '%${name?lower_case}%' or exists ( select entityUuid from Pinyin pinyin where pinyin.entityUuid = tree.unit.uuid and pinyin.type = 'CommonUnit' and lower(pinyin.pinyin) like '${pinyin?lower_case}%' ) ) order by tree.unit.code asc
